name: The Queen of Heart '99: Dream Match Never Ends
name_original: The Queen of Heart '99: Dream Match Never Ends
description:
The Queen of Heart '99: Dream Match Never Ends is an arcade-fighting game developed by Watanabe Seisakusho. It came out on 24-12-1999. Watanabe Seisakusho published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
The Queen of Heart '99: Dream Match Never Ends is available on PC.
